TopicTitle: CoL alignment issues when attaching control surfaces (Small wings) in mirror symmetry

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.2.0 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 10 | CPU: Intel i7-8700k @4.9 gHz | GPU: Nvidia GTX 1080 8gb | RAM: 32gb GDDR4

 

For some reason, the CoL is moving to the left of every aircraft I create in the VAB using mirrored symmetry. I noticed this with a MK2 ssto i was working on which up until today was fully functional with no noticeable issues and now is suffering from the CoL being off to the left and at an angle instead of centered. I recreated the entire craft step by step to see if it would happen again and it did. Furthermore, i took it a step further and created a new workspace with only x1 MK1 Inline Cockpit and x2 Small Wings (no edit) attached with mirror symmetry and the CoL was dramatically off to the left. That rules out any symmetry errors on my behalf and is 100% reproduceable. Seems to only be affecting the following parts; Xtra Small Stabilizer, Small Stabilizer, Small Wings. I tested every other size of wing, stabilizer and control surface and was only able to reproduce with the aforementioned parts. I tried to record myself going down the list of affected and unaffected parts but the file size was too big lol.
